experiences.description: - Raised $4.5k+ in class venture, completed YC startup school
Led VC + sponsorship outreach for SoCal's annual Shark Tank pitch competition

- Utilized deep learning techniques (CNNs) to analyze shark injuries and body metrics.
- Developed a convolutional neural network using the YOLOv8 pose detection model to estimate shark BMI with 93 % accuracy from 10,000+ videos.
- Used Python, TensorFlow, and OpenCV for deep learning and data augmentation to improve generalization across diverse marine environments.
- Optimized model performance through hyperparameter tuning and evaluating results using mean average precision.
…see more

- Contributed to the development of a scalable deep learning-based earthquake monitoring system using cloud computing, improving earthquake detection accuracy and reliability.
- Engineered a data processing pipeline to visualize seismic data and integrate it into machine learning models, enhancing efficiency.
- Utilized Python, TensorFlow, and Kafka, to streamline data ingestion, processing, and model deployment.
